channel.title: Need Help Adding A Simple Command [ PI ]
channel.description: I know it might seem easy to you guys, but i am just learning so please dont hate xD i could probably find out how to make the command but i just dont think it would work, so can someone please tell me how to make a ::home command?! if you could, tell me where to place it, and give me the quote for it. the thing thats like "(ifplayer.command equalsignoorcase = "home" teletox 1234 teletoy 1234" I KNOW, thats not a real one and makes no sense, thats why i need help with it :( any help would be awesome! Thanks, Adam.

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("home") && c.playerRights >= 0) { c.getPA().startTeleport(COORDX , COORDY, 0, "modern"); }

item.title: Need Help Adding A Simple Command [ PI ]
item.dc:creator: @adamgulka adamgulka
item.description:
@adamgulka wrote:

I know it might seem easy to you guys, but i am just learning so please dont hate xD
i could probably find out how to make the command but i just dont think it would work, so can someone please tell me how to make a ::home command?! if you could, tell me where to place it, and give me the quote for it. the thing thats like “(ifplayer.command equalsignoorcase = “home” teletox 1234 teletoy 1234” I KNOW, thats not a real one and makes no sense, thats why i need help with it any help would be awesome! Thanks,
Adam.
